Name: TypeOfID
Description: Brief description of the ID type. Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary.

Name: ResearcherIdentification
Description: The value of the researcher ID.

Name: URI
Description: The URI (URN or URL) of the of the researcher ID.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the purpose and use of the researcher ID. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: EffectivePeriod
Description: Clarifies when the identification information is accurate.
